hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash echo "-----------CHECKING PING CONNECTION TO THE HOST-----------" ping -c 4 $IP echo "-----------CHECKING SSH CONNECTION TO THE HOST-----------" connect=$(sshpass -p $PASS ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $USER@$IP echo ok 2>&1) if [[ $connect == ok ]] ; then echo host is accessible via SSH else echo host is not accessible via SSH fi echo "-----------INSTALL NMAP-----------" sudo apt-get udpdate sudo apt-get install nmap -y nmap --version echo "-----------CHECKS ONLINE HOSTS IN NETWORK-----------" nmap -sP -n -oN ~/nmap.txt 192.168.10.20-65 echo "-----------Remove nmap-----------" sudo apt-get remove nmap --purge -y echo "-----------PRINT LIST OF ONLINE HOSTS-----------" cat ~/nmap.txt echo "-----------DELETE FILE-----------" rm -rf ~/nmap.txt
